thread.title: Proinsias

author: Proinsias
title: Proinsias
text: Just ordered oil from this company but, inadvertently choose next day delivery, which incurred an extra charge (the order was otherwise entitled to free delivery). The company, and Naoise Ã“ Conarain in particular, were very helpful and I was refunded the extra charge without a quibble, albeit that the product arrived the next day. I should add that the product was cheaper than from my usual supplier.
